item.title: Exploring Azure Firewall's Threat Protection
item.description: In this blog post, I will discuss the various threat protection capabilities that customers are leveraging to safeguard their workload deployments in Azure using Azure Firewall. Azure Firewall is a cloud-native firewall-as-a-service solution that empowers customers to centrally govern and log all their traffic flows using a DevOps approach. This service offers both application and network-level filtering rules, and it seamlessly integrates with the Microsoft Threat Intelligence feed to filter known malicious IP addresses and domains.
